metadata.title: CVE-2016-6802 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: Apache Shiro before 1.3.2 allows attackers to bypass intended servlet filters and gain access by leveraging use of a non-root servlet context path.

criterions.comment: shiro package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.3.2-2').
